channel.title: Jan's Blog
channel.description: Jan's personal blog is all about Software Engineering.

item.title: Next-level Heading Anchors with Astro and rehype
item.description: A guide on next-level heading anchors with Astro's Markdown pages and rehype.

item.title: React, Leaflet, and SSR
item.description: A guide on using Leaflet for adding OpenStreetMap to a React application, with a hint of SSR and Preact thrown in the mix.

item.title: Masonry layout for Vue 2 and Vue 3
item.description: Responsive masonry layout with SSR support and zero dependencies for Vue 2 and Vue 3.
